name: Bulbasaur
description: A seed Pokémon that stores energy in its bulb.

name: Ivysaur
description: Its bud grows as it absorbs sunlight.

name: Venusaur
description: The flower on its back blooms with strong sunlight.

name: Charmander
description: A lizard Pokémon with a life-linked flame on its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: A fierce fighter that lashes with its burning tail.

name: Charizard
description: Spits intense flames that can melt boulders.

name: Squirtle
description: Shoots water from its mouth with great precision.

name: Wartortle
description: Its fluffy tail is a symbol of longevity.

name: Blastoise
description: Crushes foes with high-pressure water jets from its cannons.

name: Caterpie
description: A worm Pokémon that loves to eat leaves.

name: Metapod
description: Its shell is hard while it prepares to evolve.

name: Butterfree
description: Scatters poisonous powder with its wings.

name: Weedle
description: A tiny bug Pokémon with a poisonous stinger.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of movement as it prepares to evolve.

name: Beedrill
description: Defends its colony with its twin needle arms.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight that flaps its wings to stir up dust.

name: Pidgeotto
description: Territorially flies around its large forest domain.

name: Pidgeot
description: Flies at high speed to strike unsuspecting prey.

name: Rattata
description: Gnaws on anything with its sharp incisors.

name: Raticate
description: Its powerful teeth can topple concrete walls.

name: Spearow
description: Irritable and aggressive, it attacks in flocks.

name: Fearow
description: A long-necked bird that patrols wide territories.

name: Ekans
description: A sneaky snake that coils and waits for prey.

name: Arbok
description: Threatens foes with the frightening pattern on its hood.

name: Pikachu
description: Stores electricity in its cheeks and releases shocks.

name: Raichu
description: Its electric charges can knock out even large foes.

name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground to stay cool and safe.

name: Sandslash
description: Rolls into a ball and strikes with its sharp claws.

name: Nidoran♀
description: A cautious Pokémon that uses its small horn for defense.

name: Nidorina
description: Loses its horn as it matures and becomes gentler.

name: Nidoqueen
description: A powerful defender that protects its young fiercely.

name: Nidoran♂
description: Has larger ears and horn than the female counterpart.

name: Nidorino
description: An aggressive Pokémon that charges with its horn.

name: Nidoking
description: Uses its powerful tail and horn to devastate foes.

name: Clefairy
description: Said to come from the moon and love dancing under starlight.

name: Clefable
description: A mysterious Pokémon that rarely shows itself to people.

name: Vulpix
description: Has six tails that grow more beautiful with age.

name: Ninetales
description: A vengeful fox with nine long, cursed tails.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Sings lullabies that make its audience fall asleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: Its body is soft and elastic yet surprisingly resilient.

name: Zubat
description: A bat Pokémon that navigates with ultrasonic cries.

name: Golbat
description: Drains blood with its fangs and flies silently at night.

name: Oddish
description: Roams at night planting itself to absorb moonlight.

name: Gloom
description: Releases a stinky honey-like aroma from its pistil.

name: Vileplume
description: Its massive flower scatters allergy-inducing pollen.

name: Paras
description: Fungi on its back drain its nutrients.

name: Parasect
description: The fungus has taken over its body completely.

name: Venonat
description: Large eyes act like radar to spot tiny prey.

name: Venomoth
description: Scatters toxic scales from its wings when it flies.

name: Diglett
description: Lives underground and surfaces only briefly.

name: Dugtrio
description: Three Digletts acting together move lightning fast.

name: Meowth
description: Loves shiny objects and roams at night.

name: Persian
description: A classy Pokémon that strikes with swift elegance.

name: Psyduck
description: Suffers from constant headaches that unleash psychic power.

name: Golduck
description: A fast swimmer said to rescue drowning people.

name: Mankey
description: Easily angered and attacks anything it sees.

name: Primeape
description: Never stops chasing anything that angers it.

name: Growlithe
description: A loyal puppy that barks bravely at intruders.

name: Arcanine
description: Legendary in China for its beauty and speed.

name: Poliwag
description: Its spiral belly shows its internal organs.

name: Poliwhirl
description: Uses its swirl pattern to hypnotize opponents.

name: Poliwrath
description: A strong swimmer that can cross the ocean with ease.

name: Abra
description: Sleeps 18 hours a day and teleports to escape danger.

name: Kadabra
description: Its spoon amplifies extraordinary psychic powers.

name: Alakazam
description: Has an IQ said to be over 5000.

name: Machop
description: Trains its muscles endlessly to become stronger.

name: Machoke
description: Wears a belt to control its overwhelming power.

name: Machamp
description: Its four arms deliver a flurry of punches.

name: Bellsprout
description: Lures prey with its sweet scent and dissolves them.

name: Weepinbell
description: Uses vine whips and acidic spit to catch prey.

name: Victreebel
description: Waits motionless to swallow anything that approaches.

name: Tentacool
description: Drifts in shallow seas and can sting with its tentacles.

name: Tentacruel
description: Controls many tentacles to capture its foes.

name: Geodude
description: Often mistaken for a rock by hikers.

name: Graveler
description: Rolls down slopes, smashing into anything in its path.

name: Golem
description: Its rock shell cracks when it sheds its skin.

name: Ponyta
description: Its fiery mane burns hotter as it runs faster.

name: Rapidash
description: Gallops so fast it appears as a shimmering blur.

name: Slowpoke
description: So slow that it sometimes forgets it has been hurt.

name: Slowbro
description: A Shellder bite made it evolve and less aware of pain.

name: Magnemite
description: A cluster of magnets that floats using electromagnetic waves.

name: Magneton
description: Three Magnemite linked by strong magnetic forces.

name: Farfetch'd
description: Carries a leek stalk it uses like a sword.

name: Doduo
description: A two-headed bird that runs rather than flies.

name: Dodrio
description: Its three heads represent joy, anger, and sorrow.

name: Seel
description: Loves freezing seas and swims gracefully in icy water.

name: Dewgong
description: Its body is insulated against arctic cold.

name: Grimer
description: Born from polluted sludge, it smells terrible.

name: Muk
description: Its toxic body can foul even clean water.

name: Shellder
description: Clamps tightly with its sturdy shell.

name: Cloyster
description: Its shell is harder than diamond.

name: Gastly
description: A ball of gas that can slip through any wall.

name: Haunter
description: Licks foes with its tongue to sap their life.

name: Gengar
description: Hides in shadows and causes eerie chills.

name: Onix
description: A massive rock snake that tunnels through mountains.

name: Drowzee
description: Puts people to sleep and eats their dreams.

name: Hypno
description: Uses its pendulum to control others' sleep.

name: Krabby
description: A crab Pokémon that lives on beaches and river mouths.

name: Kingler
description: Has a huge pincer that packs intense power.

name: Voltorb
description: Looks like a Poké Ball and may self-destruct.

name: Electrode
description: The fastest Pokémon that often explodes.

name: Exeggcute
description: A group of eggs linked by psychic power.

name: Exeggutor
description: A walking tropical tree with multiple heads.

name: Cubone
description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother.

name: Marowak
description: A bone-wielding warrior skilled in club attacks.

name: Hitmonlee
description: Extends and retracts its legs to deliver high kicks.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Punches at blinding speed with different elemental blows.

name: Lickitung
description: Uses its long tongue to taste and explore everything.

name: Koffing
description: Filled with toxic gases that explode when ignited.

name: Weezing
description: Twin Koffing that merged into one poisonous cloud.

name: Rhyhorn
description: A rough Pokémon that charges without thinking.

name: Rhydon
description: Walks on hind legs and can topple buildings.

name: Chansey
description: A rare Pokémon that shares its healing egg.

name: Tangela
description: A vine-covered body that hides its true form.

name: Kangaskhan
description: Raises its baby in a protective pouch.

name: Horsea
description: Spits ink to escape while swimming in the sea.

name: Seadra
description: Its sharp fins can cut through drifters in the sea.

name: Goldeen
description: A graceful swimmer nicknamed the water queen.

name: Seaking
description: Digs nests in riverbeds during breeding season.

name: Staryu
description: Its core glows at night like a star.

name: Starmie
description: An enigmatic Pokémon that emits strange radio signals.

name: Mr. Mime
description: Creates invisible walls with its miming gestures.

name: Scyther
description: A swift hunter that slashes with sharp scythes.

name: Jynx
description: A humanoid Pokémon that dances and chants spells.

name: Electabuzz
description: Draws power from thunderclouds and power plants.

name: Magmar
description: Lives near volcanoes and bathes in lava.

name: Pinsir
description: Crushes enemies with its powerful horns.

name: Tauros
description: A wild bull that charges while whipping itself.

name: Magikarp
description: Famous for being weak but persistent.

name: Gyarados
description: A once-weak fish that became a raging sea serpent.

name: Lapras
description: A gentle giant that ferries people across seas.

name: Ditto
description: Transforms into any Pokémon it sees.

name: Eevee
description: Has unstable genes that allow many evolutions.

name: Vaporeon
description: Can melt into water and vanish from sight.

name: Jolteon
description: Builds up static charge in its fur to strike.

name: Flareon
description: Stores intense heat in its fluffy coat.

name: Porygon
description: A Pokémon made entirely of programming code.

name: Omanyte
description: A resurrected ancient shellfish Pokémon.

name: Omastar
description: Uses its many tentacles to ensnare prey.

name: Kabuto
description: A resurrected fossil that hides under rocks.

name: Kabutops
description: A predator that slices with blade-like arms.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A savage prehistoric Pokémon that ruled the skies.

name: Snorlax
description: Sleeps most of the time and blocks roads.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird that controls ice and snow.

name: Zapdos
description: A legendary bird that controls thunder.

name: Moltres
description: A legendary bird wreathed in sacred flames.

name: Dratini
description: A mysterious dragon Pokémon that molts as it grows.

name: Dragonair
description: Glides gracefully and controls the weather.

name: Dragonite
description: A kindhearted dragon that circles the globe in 16 hours.

name: Mewtwo
description: A genetically engineered Pokémon with terrifying power.

name: Mew
description: Contains the genetic code of all Pokémon.
